testcase.name: 1.6.(b) - Negative filing indicators
testcase.description: An instance document MAY include appropriate negative (i.e. with @find:filed="false" filing indicator elements indicating reporting units which are intended NOT to be reported in the instance document.

variation.description: XBRL instance with filing indicators for a given module (one declared with @find:filed="true", one without and one @find:filed="false").
